page.title: 20HOUSING.Vigo Village.
page.content: In our D block is included a part of Vigo Village.The village,set in woodland,is relatively new.The first houses being built about 19 years ago.All houses are privately owned and range from terraced to detached properties.Although the amenities of the village are outside our area naturally all people living in the village use these facilities. All of the children questionned enjoy living in the village.They particularily like the village atmosphere with its social amenities and the proximity to Trosley Park. As yet there is no church in the village but the village hall is used for religious meetings.A public house has just been built.The main complaint was that the local bus service was unreliable and expensive
